pullRequest.title: Runtime compressed refs work
pullRequest.bodyText:
Get DDR working in mixed mode.
[ci skip]
Signed-off-by: Graham Chapman graham_chapman@ca.ibm.com

nodes.bodyText: The name 'MIXED_MODE' is a little generic; it would be better if it mentioned 'references'.
Is interp_flagsInClassSlot another of those flags that can't be turned off?
